processors.name: JoltTransformJSON
processors.comments: The shift operation moves all elements from nested arrays (*.*) into a single flat array ([]).

processors.name: UpdateAttribute
processors.comments:
Combine each new page with the existing page. Note this is not a valid JSON but it will be fixed in a later processor.  
Example after two pages: all_pages = "[{...}, {...}],[{...}]"
